snippet: Amid growing acrimony among the fractious partners of Israel’s governing coalition, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu also berated ministers for attacking him.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, amid political crisis over a proposed nationality law and growing acrimony among fractious partners of Israel’s governing coalition, hints at possibility of elections only 20 months after his current government was formed
lead_paragraph: Amid growing acrimony among the fractious partners of Israel’s governing coalition, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu also berated ministers for attacking him.

headline.main: Netanyahu Hints at Possibility of New Elections
headline.print_headline: Israel: As His Coalition Frays, Netanyahu Hints at Early Elections
